column4: anyone know why the installer would hang the second something is selected from the boot splash screen?  the "Try Ubuntu without changes..." ""Install" "Check disc..." one?
successfully boots to the disc, but fails the second anything is chosen.  installed ubuntu countless times, but never had this happen and I can't figure it out.
Did you do a mem-check? sometimes bad ram won't be evident until then
I haven't, but I'd be surprised as this machine has been working flawlessly.  Choosing mem-check from the ubuntu disc makes it hang as well, so I'm not sure what to do.
